```{r, message = FALSE}
library(rvest)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
my_value <- "H"
t <-  read_html("http://eoddata.com/stocklist/NYSE/", my_value, ".htm")
my_list <- t %>% html_table(fill = T)

```


```{r}
class(my_list)



```


```{r}
t

(my_list <-  
  t %>% 
  html_table(fill = TRUE))

```


```{r}
class(my_list)
```

```{r}
df <- my_list[[1]]
df
```


```{r}
names(df)
```

```{r}
df[1,]
```
